mapper.sql: id, doctorCode, doctorName, adminType, currencyField, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, areaType, operatorId, operatorName
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.doctorCode, p.doctorName, p.adminType, p.COMMENTS, p.STATE, p.IS_DELETEMARK, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.CREATE_TIME, p.CREATE_USER_ID, p.MODIFY_USER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT( case when d.fyid = '1001' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(本院)' ) when d.fyid = '1002' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(西院)' ) when d.fyid = '1003' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(金银湖)' ) else d.dksName end ) currencyField, p.areaType, p.operatorId, p.operatorName FROM yb_chs_confire p left join yb_chs_confire_data d on p.id = d.pid where p.IS_DELETEMARK = 1
AND p.areaType = #{ areaType }
and (p.doctorCode like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%') or p.doctorName like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%'))
and p.adminType = #{ adminType }
and p.id in(select DISTINCT pid from yb_chs_confire_data where deptName like concat('%', #{ deptContent } ,'%'))
and p.operatorName like concat('%', #{ operatorName } ,'%')
GROUP BY p.id
order by p.create_time desc
order by p.operatorId desc

SELECT p.id, p.doctorCode, p.doctorName, p.adminType, p.COMMENTS,
1 STATE,
case when p.doctorCode = #{ doctorCode } then 2 else 1 end STATE,
p.IS_DELETEMARK, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.CREATE_TIME, p.CREATE_USER_ID, p.MODIFY_USER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT( case when d.fyid = '1001' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(本院)' ) when d.fyid = '1002' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(西院)' ) when d.fyid = '1003' then CONCAT( d.dksName, '(金银湖)' ) else d.dksName end ) currencyField, p.areaType, p.operatorId, p.operatorName FROM yb_chs_confire p left join yb_chs_confire_data d on p.id = d.pid where p.IS_DELETEMARK = 1
AND p.areaType = #{ areaType }
and (p.doctorCode like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%') or p.doctorName like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%'))
and p.adminType = #{ adminType }
and p.CREATE_USER_ID = #{ uid }
and (p.CREATE_USER_ID = #{ uid } or p.doctorCode=#{ doctorCode })
and p.id in(select DISTINCT pid from yb_chs_confire_data where deptName like concat('%', #{ deptContent } ,'%'))
and p.operatorName like concat('%', #{ operatorName } ,'%')
GROUP BY p.id
order by p.create_time desc
order by p.operatorId desc
